import React from "react"; import {useQuery} from '@apollo/react-hooks'; import {Navbar, ListGroupItem} from 'reactstrap'; import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'; import "./../assets/scss/style.scss"; import {ALL_CHARACTERS, FIND_CHARACTER_BY_ID} from "../queries"; //import PeopleItem from "../templates/peopleItem"; function App() { const getAllCharacters = useQuery(ALL_CHARACTERS, {variables: {length: 5}}); const character = useQuery(FIND_CHARACTER_BY_ID, {variables: {id: "cGVvcGxlOjE="}}); if (getAllCharacters.loading || character.loading) return (
Ravn Star Wars Registry
Loading
); if (getAllCharacters.error || character.error) return (
Ravn Star Wars Registry
Failed to Load Data
); let listview = getAllCharacters.data.allPeople.edges.map((obj) => { let node = obj.node; return (

{node.name}

{node.species.name} from {node.homeworld.name}

) }); return (
Ravn Star Wars Registry
{listview}
) } export default App;
